_header: If thou wilt eschew bitter adventure
_description: How to avoid heartbreak — one cross-rhymed quatrain

DULCosViii9.Transcription:
Yf thou wilt eschew bytter aduentureAnd avoyde the knawinge of a
                    pensive harteSette in no one persone wholly thie pleasureThe lesse
                    shalt thowe yoye but lesse shalt þu smarte
